title: Authorization Survey
content: Services dedicated to authorization are evolving rapidly. There is a steady establishment of policy languages, purpose-built for authorization, as well as a growing number of implementations of Google’s "Zanzibar" whitepaper, their .  To better understand how we should evolve Keycloak Authorization Services in this context, we’d appreciate the opportunity to learn more about the Keycloak communities' authorization use cases and experience, regardless of whether you’ve used Keycloak Authorization Services before or if you use a different service for access management.  Please consider filling out to help shape Keycloak’s future authorization experience.
